mapper.select: SELECT ct.card_idx, c.bank_name, c.card_name, c.card_image, ct.card_transaction_date, ct.card_transaction_time, cat.category_name, ct.card_transaction_description, ct.amount FROM card_transaction ct JOIN card c ON ct.card_idx = c.card_idx JOIN category cat ON ct.category_idx = cat.category_idx WHERE c.member_idx = #{memberIdx} AND c.connected_status = 1 ORDER BY card_transaction_date DESC

SELECT cat.category_name, ct.card_transaction_description, ct.amount FROM card_transaction ct JOIN card c ON ct.card_idx = c.card_idx JOIN category cat ON ct.category_idx = cat.category_idx WHERE c.member_idx = #{memberIdx} AND c.connected_status = 1 AND ct.card_transaction_date BETWEEN CONCAT(#{startYear}, '-', #{startMonth}, '-', #{startDay}) AND CONCAT(#{endYear}, '-', #{endMonth}, '-', #{endDay});

SELECT a.bank_name, a.account_name, a.account_image, `at`.account_transaction_date, `at`.account_transaction_time, `at`.account_transaction_type, cat.category_name, `at`.account_transaction_description, `at`.amount FROM account_transaction `at` JOIN account a ON `at`.account_idx = a.account_idx JOIN category cat ON `at`.category_idx = cat.category_idx WHERE a.member_idx = #{memberIdx} AND a.connected_status = 1 ORDER BY account_transaction_date DESC
